prodNameC: 邦迪斯人類抗細胞核萃取物抗體篩檢免疫分析套組
prodNameE: THE BINDING SITE BINDAZYME ENA SCREEN Enzyme Immunoassay kit
ingredientsDesc:
Instruction Leaflet: giving full assay details.
QC Certificate: indicating the expected performance of the batch.
ENA Coated Wells: 12 x 8 well strips coated with a mixture of purified antigens (SSA/Ro (60 and 52 kD), SSB/La, Sm, Sm/RNP, Scl-70 and Jo-1).
Type III Wash Buffer 20x concentrate: 1 bottle containing 50 ml of a 20x concentrated buffer for washing the wells.
Type III Sample Diluent: 2 bottles containing 50 ml of buffer for diluting the samples.
ENA Screen Cut-off Control: 1 bottle containing 1.9 ml of diluted stabilized human serum. The expected ENA result is given on the QC certificate.
ENA Screen Positive Control: 1 bottle containing 1.9 ml of diluted stabilized human serum. The expected ENA result is given on the QC certificate.
ENA Negative Control: 1 bottle containing 1.9 ml of diluted stabilized human serum. The expected ENA result is given on the QC certificate.
ENA Screen Conjugate: 1 bottle containing 12 ml of peroxidase labeled antibody to human IgG.
TMB Substrate: 1 bottle conta
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區康寧街169巷25號13樓
efficacy: 利用專一性的IgG抗體抗抽取的核內抗原(ENA’S)篩選人類血清，SSA/Ro(60和52 kD)，SSB/La，Sm，Sm/RNP， Scl-70，Jo-1可用來測量系統性的風濕疾病。
